item.description:
Please meet us for drinks Saturday June 25, 2009 at 5:00 pm at the Bella Luna Bar and Restaurant in Jamaica Plain. Conveniently located near the Stony Brook T station with plenty of parking; this wonderful space combines the industrial elements of the old brewery -- brick walls, high ceilings, steel columns, and large windows -- with a sci-fi inspired riot of color -- star lights, hand-painted plates, red walls and booths, sparkly blue cushions (menu below). This will be our official low key Meet and Greet for all members. Please RSVP today. We’ll see you soon!

Location Details:
http://www.milkywayjp...
284 Amory Street, Jamaica Plain, 02130 - Located in the Brewery Plaza Next to the ULA Café - (617) 524-6060






Bella Luna's Website
item.name: Bella Luna Bar and Restaurant in Jamaica Plain
